channel.title: Medium on Consulting Statistician
channel.description: Recent content in Medium on Consulting Statistician

item.title: Week 36: Medium Posts
item.description: #loading packages #load data library(readr) #manipulate data library(dplyr) library(magrittr) # format table with expense library(formattable) # knitting the document library(knitr) # another type of table library(kableExtra) # playing with strings library(stringr) # combining two plots library(grid) library(gridExtra) # that theme you wanted library(ggthemr) # text analysis library(tm) library(SnowballC) library(RColorBrewer) library(wordcloud) # adding theme called fresh for plots ggthemr("fresh") #loading the data medium <- read_csv("medium_datasci.csv") attach(medium) Focusing on Claps with Authors and publications, where does writing alot of posts will get you popularity and claps.
